com.nerjal.json.parser.options

Class StringParseOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nerjal.json.parser.options.StringParseOptions

  • public class StringParseOptions
extends Object

    Stringification options for JsonString elements.

    Allows to set whether should the string be stringified using simple quoted or double quoted keys.

    Hence only two formats for strings' stringification are available, each only affecting the string's quoting.

    Default is double-quoted, in order to better fit to JSON4 standards, for a better compatibility.
    Author:
    Nerjal Nosk
